summary: Water quality is stable but TDS is slightly elevated compared to the 7-day average.

insights.recommendation: Maintain current pH levels; ideal for tilapia and plants.
Consider reducing feed or increasing water changes to lower TDS.
Maintain temperature; optimal for both tilapia and plants.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.052 / 7.025 / 7.071 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 312.833 / 295.8 / 347.6 ppm (trend: down)
• Temp avg/min/max: 27.682 / 27.25 / 28.56 °C (trend: up)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
